description:
'''Seresta''' is a traditional Brazilian music style from the first half of the 20th century. The musician who plays seresta is called a ''seresteiro''.

In the 1960s, the Museum of Seresta and Serenata ({{langx|pt|Museu da Seresta e da Serenata}}) opened in [[Valença, Rio de Janeiro]]. The municipality also hosts events like the "Seresteiros Festival".
